page.title: 02GAMES SURVEY Battle Hill 1st
page.content: We did a survey of all the games the children of Battle Hill Estate were interested in.During playtime and lunchtime the boys enjoyed playing football most of all,but in summer they liked practising for Sports Day by having races.Girls like playing chasey hide and seek,hopscotch and skips.The craze after school for the boys was playing on their B.M.X.bikes,doing tricks such as wheelies,jumps,wheel spins.The boys all were very saftey conscious and wore Knee pads and helmets.Breakdancing,i.e.,body-popping is also popular an energetic way of dancing.The girls of Battle Hill enjoy riding their bike,playing houses,tennis and rounders,singing and dancing their favourite pop songs.Many children are members of clubs and organisations,such as the Brownies,Cubs and Judo Club.
